title: FOOD TAX CREDITS AND REFUNDS – Amends existing law to increase the food tax credit and to provide an alternative tax credit for the actual amount paid by taxpayers on food purchases.
subject: FOOD
TAX AND TAXATION
TAX AND TAXATION, INCOME
